casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Michael REED 365A16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 20, 2018 E. Burke Haywood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Paul E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Reed, David Michael.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 17th of August 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 21st day of September 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
